column3: sɛ idu asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no do

column2: "fa asaase no do nduadzewa a ibenya no wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do no
column3: no nduadzewa a odzi kan no nyinara mu bi; na fa gu kɛntsɛn mu
column4: na fa kɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi dɛ ne dzin ntsena hɔ no."

column2: "Na kɔ ɔsɔfo a ɔbɛtsena hɔ nda no mu no nkyɛn
column3: na se no dɛ ndɛ da yi mepaa mu meka kyerɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column4: dɛ medu asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɛn egyanom dɛ ɔdze rema hɛn no do."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no ngye kɛntsɛn no wɔ wo nsamu
column3: na ɔmfa nsi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn n’afɔrmbukyia no enyim."

column2: "Na bua na ka no wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim dɛ
column3: Sirianyi a ɔreyɛ ahera nye m’egya
column6: ne nyimpa kumaabi; na ɔyɛɛ ɔman kɛse a wɔyɛ dzen

column4: na wɔdze nkowaasom dzendzen too hɛn do:"

column2: "na EWURADZE dze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen
column6: nye anwanwadze yii hɛn fii Egypt firii:"

column2: "na ɔdze hɛn aba bea yi do
column3: na ɔdze asaase yi ama hɛn
column4: asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do."

column6: dze ama me no do nduadzewa a odzi kan no aba. Na fa si EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim
column7: na sɔr wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim:"

column2: "na gye w’enyi wɔ adzepa a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze ama ɔwo
column6: nye ɔhɔho a ɔwɔ wo mu no."

column2: "Sɛ iwie wo ndɔbaa mu ebupɛn du du nyinara yiyi wɔ afe a otsia ebiasa no a ɔyɛ ebupɛn du du yiyi afe no mu a
column7: ma wondzi wɔ wo kuropon mu

column2: "na se wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim dɛ
column3: Meyi ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn no efi me fie
column4: na afei so medze ama Levinyi
column8: dɛ mbrɛ wo mbrasɛm a edze ahyɛ me no nyinara tse monntoo wo mbransɛm mu biara

column3: nkyii so minnyii bi nnkyenee dɛ no ho nntsew ntsi
column4: na memmfaa bi memmaa ewufo so: metsie EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn ndze
column5: mayɛ dɛ mbrɛ edze ahyɛ me no nyinara."

column6: nye asaase a edze ama hɛn no
column7: dɛ mbrɛ ekaa ntam kyerɛɛ hɛn egyanom no
column8: asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no."

column2: "Ndɛ da yi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn rehyɛ wo dɛ yɛ ahyɛdze nye atsɛmbu yi: dɛm ntsi fa w’akoma nyinara nye wo kra nyinara dzi do na yɛ."

column3: aka ato gua dɛ edze EWURADZE bɛyɛ wo Nyankopɔn

column2: "na EWURADZE aka ato gua ndɛ da yi dɛ ebɛyɛ nankasa no soronko man
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔabɔ wo anohoba no
column4: na eedzi ne mbransɛm nyinara do;"

column2: "na ɔaama wo do akyɛn amanaman a ɔayɛ nyinara
column5: nye enyidzi mu; na aayɛ ɔman krɔnkrɔn ama EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
